# General info

Goal : translate mRNA with metagenetic data into transcribable mRNA

Input : mRNA on the stack with metagenetic data
Output : mRNA on the stack without metagenetic data


## Description

The mRNA meta-mutator reads sequentially the mRNA on the stack, detects metagenetic data if there is some, 
in which case it calls the corresponding mutator to build the latter codon.
